verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13977'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَمَعَ نَفَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13978'>رٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4673'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِ فَقَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul ūḥiya ilayya annahustama'a nafarum minal-jinni fa qālū innā sami'nā qur'ānan 'ajabā(n).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Открыто мне, что джиннов сонм, Услышав чтение, сказали: "Поистине, мы дивный слышали Коран

verses.text_uthmani: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَهْد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13979'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّشْدِ فَـَٔـامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۖ وَل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13980'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yahdī ilar-rusydi fa'āmannā bih(ī), wa lan nusyrika birabbinā aḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Он к Истине указывает путь, В него уверовали мы И в поклонении Аллаху Других богов не будем измышлять

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> تَعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9277'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذَ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِبَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13981'>ةً و</tajweed>َلَا وَلَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annahū ta'ālā jaddu rabbinā mattakhaża ṣāḥibataw wa lā waladā(n).
verses.translation: И пусть достойно вознесется Величественность нашего Владыки, - Себе ни сына, ни супруги Он не брал

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':412'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annahū kāna yaqūlu safīhunā 'alallāhi syaṭaṭā(n).
verses.translation: Средь нас один безумец был, Кто возмутительную (ложь) высказывал против Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا ظَنَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13982'>ن ت</tajweed>َقُولَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13983'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7884'>نس</tajweed>ُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7885'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':412'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā ẓanannā allan taqūlal-insu wal-jinnu 'alallāhi każibā(n).
verses.translation: Мы думали, ни люди и ни джинны Ложь на Аллаха никогда не станут возводить

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ رِجَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13984'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4410'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4338'>نس</tajweed>ِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13985'>لٍ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4673'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annahū kāna rijālum minal insi ya'ūżūna birijālim minal-jinni fa zādūhum rahaqā(n).
verses.translation: Конечно, средь людей бывали и такие, Которые убежища искали среди джиннов, Но те лишь увеличили безумие таких

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ ظَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَمَا ظَنَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12002'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11863'>َن ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4140'>بْ</tajweed>عَثَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11864'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum allay yab'aṡallāhu aḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Они считали, как и вы, Что никого Аллах вам не пошлет, (Чтоб вас на путь Его наставить)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمَسْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13986'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ فَوَجَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13987'>دْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13988'>سًا ش</tajweed>َدِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13989'>دًا و</tajweed>َشُهُبًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā lamasnas-samā'a fa wajadnāhā muli'at ḥarasan syadīdaw wa syuhubā(n).
verses.translation: Мы прикоснулись (к таинствам) небес И там нашли их полными могучих стражей И светочей, (что разлетаются сжигающим огнем)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13990'>قْ</tajweed>عُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ‌ۖ فَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13991'>َن ي</tajweed>َسْتَمِعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13992'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَنَ يَجِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1067'>دْ</tajweed> لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> شِهَا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13993'>بًا ر</tajweed>َّصَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā kunnā naq'udu minhā maqā'ida lis-sam'(i), famay yastami'il-āna yajid lahū syihābar raṣadā(n).
verses.translation: Мы на седалищах там затаились, Чтоб слышать, (что там говорят); Но кто сейчас услышать пожелает, Найдет там для себя Подстерегающий его горящий светоч

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَا نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12439'>دْ</tajweed>ر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7793'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā lā nadrī asyarrun urīda biman fil-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rasyadā(n).
verses.translation: И мы понять того не можем: Задумано ли зло для тех, кто на земле

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13994'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحُونَ وَمِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا دُونَ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ‌ۖ كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا طَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā minnaṣ-ṣāliḥūna wa minnā dūna żālik(a), kunnā ṭarā'iqa qidadā(n).
verses.translation: Средь нас есть те, Кто добродетелен и кто порочен, - Идем различными путями мы

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا ظَنَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13995'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّعْجِزَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13996'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13997'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّعْجِزَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هَرَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā ẓanannā allan nu'jizallāha fil-arḍi wa lan nu'jizahū harabā(n).
verses.translation: Но знаем: Могущества Аллаха на земле нам не ослабить И (замыслов) Его не избежать

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا سَمِعْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13998'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهُدَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> ءَامَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۖ فَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13999'>َن ي</tajweed>ُؤْم<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14000'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>ِرَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14001'>سًا و</tajweed>َلَا رَهَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā lammā sami'nal-hudā āmannā bih(ī), famay yu'mim birabbihī falā yakhāfu bakhsaw wa lā rahaqā(n).
verses.translation: И мы, когда услышали про путь прямой, В него уверовали (тотчас), - Ведь тот, кто верует, - Тому неведом страх Ни пред потерею (награды в День Суда), Ни перед незаслуженною (карой)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14002'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14003'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>سِطُونَ‌ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ تَحَرَّوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annā minnal-muslimūna wa minnal-qāsiṭūn(a), faman aslama fa ulā'ika taḥarrau rasyadā(n).
verses.translation: Средь нас есть те, кто Господу предался, Но есть и те, кто отступил. И те, которые предАлись, Идут по верному пути

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14004'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>سِطُونَ فَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لِجَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ حَطَبًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ammal-qāsiṭūna fa kānū lijahannama ḥaṭabā(n).
verses.translation: Но те, кто отступил, - Им быть растопкою для адова костра

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَلَّوِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14005'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14006'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14007'>ُم م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءً غَدَقًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa allawistaqāmū 'alaṭ-ṭarīqati la'asqaināhum mā'an gadaqā(n).
verses.translation: А если б удержались на прямой стезе они, Мы напоили б их водой обильной

verses.text_uthmani: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14008'>َن ي</tajweed>ُعْرِضْ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3773'>ن ذ</tajweed>ِكْرِ رَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14009'>بًا ص</tajweed>َعَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Linaftinahum fīh(i), wa may yu'riḍ 'an żikri rabbihī yasluk-hu 'ażāban ṣa'adā(n).
verses.translation: Мы этим испытали б их; Того ж, кто Бога своего не поминает, Подвергнет Он суровой каре

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14010'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>جِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7934'>دْ</tajweed>عُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3975'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annal-masājida lillāhi falā tad'ū ma'allāhi aḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Лишь для Аллаха все места молений! И вы других богов Ему не измышляйте

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا قَامَ عَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8319'>بْ</tajweed>دُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8320'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14011'>دْ</tajweed>عُوهُ كَادُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa annahū lammā qāma 'abdullāhi yad'ūhu kādū yakūnūna 'alaihi libadā(n).
verses.translation: И вот когда, к Всевышнему взывая, Поднялся раб Аллаха (Мухаммад), Они толпою плотной встали вкруг него

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6847'>دْ</tajweed>عُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَبِّى وَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُشْرِكُ بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul innamā ad'ū rabbī wa lā usyriku bihī aḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Взываю я лишь к своему Владыке И соучастников Ему не придаю

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَر<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3719'>ًّا و</tajweed>َلَا رَشَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarraw wa lā rasyadā(n).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Не властен я ни злом (вас наказать) (И ни добром) на путь вас праведный наставить

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى ل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14012'>َن ي</tajweed>ُجِيرَنِى مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أَحَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14013'>دٌ و</tajweed>َلَنْ أَجِدَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3136'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul innī lay yujīranī minallāhi aḥad(un), wa lan ajida min dūnihī multaḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Никто меня от Господа не защитит, И не найти убежища нигде мне, Кроме как у Бога

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا بَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14014'>غًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَرِسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۚ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2634'>َن ي</tajweed>َعْصِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2635'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> نَارَ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَبَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā balāgam minallāhi wa risālātih(ī), wa may ya'ṣillāha wa rasūlahū fa inna lahū nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadā(n).
verses.translation: Коль я не передам (того, что Он вещает), Его посланий (вам не изъясню). А тем, кто будет непослушен Аллаху и посланнику Его, Назначен Ад, где пребывать им вечно

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِذَا رَأَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14015'>رًا و</tajweed>َأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżā ra'au mā yū'adūna fasaya'lamūna man aḍ'afu nāṣiraw wa aqallu 'adadā(n).
verses.translation: Когда же наконец они увидят то, Что было им обещано (в сей жизни), Они узнают, Кто слабее по числу (помощников) своих И меньше по числу (собратьев)

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8888'>دْ</tajweed>ر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَقَرِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14016'>بٌ م</tajweed>َّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4388'>جْ</tajweed>عَلُ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> رَبّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul in adrī aqarībum mā tū'adūna am yaj'alu lahū rabbī amadā(n).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Не знаю я, близка ли вам обещанная (кара) Или Аллах назначил более далекий срок. Или Господь на путь прямой желает их направить

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4186'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَحَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Ālimul-gaibi falā yuẓhiru 'alā gaibihī aḥadā(n).
verses.translation: Ему лишь одному Незримое известно, И в сокровенное Свое Он не допустит никого

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا مَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14017'>ٱ</tajweed>رْتَضَىٰ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2882'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّسُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14018'>لٍ ف</tajweed>َإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> يَسْلُكُ م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':4612'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> رَصَدًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā manirtaḍā mir rasūlin fa innahū yasluku mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihī raṣadā(n).
verses.translation: Кроме посланника, которого Он выбрал, И стражей перед ним и сзади

verses.text_uthmani: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3885'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14019'>بْ</tajweed>لَغُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رِسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدَۢا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Liya'lama an qad ablagū risālāti rabbihim wa aḥāṭa bimā ladaihim wa aḥṣā kulla syai'in 'adadā(n).
verses.translation: Чтобы (с уверенностью) мог он знать, Что (в чистоте и точности) Они передают ему послания Господни, - Господь объемлет их во всем И счет ведет всему, что суще
